homeCare.title: Home Care Services
homeCare.subtitle: Professional care in the comfort of your home

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to common queries about our services

questions.question: How do I book an appointment with a doctor?
questions.answer: You can book an appointment by visiting the doctor's profile and selecting your preferred time slot. We'll confirm your appointment within 24 hours.

questions.question: What types of home care services do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer various home care services including elderly care, rehabilitation, personal care, and skilled nursing.

questions.question: Are all healthcare providers verified?
questions.answer: Yes, all our healthcare providers undergo thorough background checks and credential verification before joining our platform.

questions.question: How do I pay for services?
questions.answer: We offer secure online payment options through our platform. You can pay using credit cards, debit cards, or other supported payment methods.

about.title: About Shfia
about.missionDescription: We are dedicated to providing complete healthcare solutions through a network of qualified professionals.
about.providersDescription: Join our network to reach more patients and provide top-notch care.
